## Course Schedule

The schedule below is tentative and subject to change. You are responsible for keeping up with any changes made to the schedule.

## Assignments

Below are assignment due dates for the semester. You can find details and assignment instructions in the relevant week on the schedule.

### Homework

Homework will be due by Sunday at 11:59pm. You will have at least 11/12 days to complete each homework assignment.

### Labs

Labs will be due on Fridays at 11:59pm. You will start the lab during your scheduled lab section.

### Exams

There will be two exams on the dates TBD.
